ZOD_ERROR_IPV4_OR_IPV4CIDR_INVALID: Must be a valid IPv4 address or an IPv4 CIDR. (e.g. 192.168.0.1 or 192.168.0.0/24)
ZOD_ERROR_IPV4_OR_IPV4CIDR_OVERLAP: Overlap detected with another network range, please choose another value
ZOD_ERROR_VLAN_ID_HELPER: The VLAN ID must be between {{minId}} and {{maxId}}
ZOD_ERROR_VLAN_ID_ALREADY_IN_USE: The VLAN ID is already in use
